  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Las aguas subterráneas</string>
            <string language="en">Subterranean water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterirdisches Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau souterraine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água subterranean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua sotteranea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπόγειο ύδωρ</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica el concepto de aguas subterráneas y los factores que condicionan la infiltración, clima, pendiente y vegetación. Además, se realiza una ampliación sobre la permeabilidad.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the concept of subterranean water and the factors which condition infiltration, climate, slope and vegetation. There is also additional information about permeability.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">agua</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches das Konzept des unterirdischen 
Wassers erklären und die Faktoren, die Infiltration, Klima, Steigung 
und Vegetation bedingen. Es gibt auch zusätzliche Informationen
über Permeabilität.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant le concept de l'eau souterraine 
et les facteurs qui conditionnent l'infiltration, le climat, la pente 
et la végétation. Il y a également des informations 
supplémentaires sur la perméabilité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explicam o conceito da água 
subterranean e os fatores que condicionam o infiltration, o clima, a 
inclinação e a vegetação. Há também uma informação 
adicional sobre a permeabilidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiegano il concetto di acqua 
sotteranea ed i fattori che condizionano l'infiltrazione, il clima, il
pendio e la vegetazione. Ci sono egualmente le informazioni 
supplementari su permeabilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί την έννοια του υπόγειου ύδατος και 
των παραγόντων που ρυθμίζουν τη διήθηση, το κλίμα, την κλίση και 
τη βλάστηση. Υπάρχουν επίσης πρόσθετες πληροφορίες για τη 
διαπερατότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
